values.value: - Current Account แสดงเฉพาะสถานะ 00-NORMAL, 01-FROZEN; NO DDA ACTIVITY, 02-NO CHECK ACTIVITY, 06-DORMANT, 07-INACTIVE, 09-CREDITS ONLY ALLOWED - Savings Account แสดงเฉพาะสถานะ 00-ACTIVE (Normal), 01-INACTIVE, 02-DORMANT, 06-UNREDEEMED (CD or Club), 07-FROZEN (No monetary activity), 08-FROZEN (No external activity except status changes)
